channel.title: Avatar Uploading
channel.description:
Finally did up an avatar for the forums and I'm met by a massive brick wall.
I try to use the upload feature built into the forums but it renders out blurred. When I attempt to use a direct URL from PhotoBucket it shoots this message at me. [quote] Upload failed due to failure writing temporary file. [/quote] My security is set to allow temporary files from BMS.com as well as allowing 50mb in all to be used for temporary files. So I'm curious is if anyone else is having this issue to depict weather it's me or the site.

item.title: Avatar Uploading
item.dc:creator: I_amp_lt_3Tacos
item.description:
OP is short for original poster and you’re welcome!

item.dc:creator: bipolarmike
item.description:
Speaking of Avatars (and because I couldn’t find a thread for this), do I have to earn the right to upload one or something? I can’t find anywhere to upload one, or make me-self a signature.

Read full topic

item.title: Avatar Uploading
item.dc:creator: FrozenNos
item.description:
Try shrinking the image.

Read full topic

item.title: Avatar Uploading
item.dc:creator: Guf
item.description:
If the server is resizing the image at all, it may lose the transparency.
By default, PNG stores no colour info for transparent pixels (prematted against white if you want to put it that way). Try again after putting a black background in it…

Read full topic

item.title: Avatar Uploading
item.dc:creator: Victus
item.description:
So, I managed to get my Avatar uploaded, but it makes the background of .png files white like a .jpg - Curious as to why.

Read full topic
